verbs.description: < p > [ARG1: Oil prices] [V: finished] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday 's session] [ARGM-EXT: at new 3½-year highs] [ARGM-TMP: after President Trump abandoned a nuclear deal with Iran and announced the " highest level " of sanctions against the OPEC] member.</p >

< p > Oil prices finished Wednesday 's session at new 3½-year highs after [ARG0: President Trump] [V: abandoned] [ARG1: a nuclear deal with Iran] and announced the " highest level " of sanctions against the OPEC member.</p >
